It yips and goes past, but ANOTHER moves in -- He jabs it with the business end of the spear and it SNARLS, retreating, baring its fangs. Now half a dozen are circling him in the open, and he sees what he's up against.   The VIPERWOLVES are six-limbed with shiny chitinous skin, their paws leathery BLACK HANDS. Intelligent eyes. Glistening black teeth in dead white gums. Jake realizes that he is making his final stand.   He whirls the torch in an arc, keeping them at bay -- And feels a rush of adrenaline. It goes through him like a lightning bolt and the fear is gone.

direction.raw_text: rides inside the columns at the base of Hometree, shouting an ululating WARNING. Jake is force-marched through the pillars into -- INT. COMMONS/HOMETREE - NIGHT An open CENTRAL AREA. The villagers gather to see the arriving hunt party. We see the people of the tribe -- mothers with babies, old women, young hunters. They gawk at the alien, expressions ranging from curiosity to outright hostility. The huge eyes of the children follow him. Jake is amazed at the size of HOMETREE inside. By the light of the COOK-FIRES he can see up into a vast cylindrical gallery -- a living cathedral. Clear membranes -- sturmbeest bladders -- filled with fluttering bio-luminescent insects, act as area lighting. The central space is dominated by the SKULL of some enormous creature, mounted with much embellishment on a TOTEM. Standing in front of this, awaiting their approach, is -- EYTUKAN (AY-too-kahn), the Clan Leader. Eytukan has deeply chiselled features and a long chest mantle of THANATOR CLAWS. direction.raw_text: is an astounding formation. Thick vine-like trees have trapped large FLOATING BOULDERS of UNOBTANIUM in their gnarled grip. A hundred meters above them more boulders are WOVEN into the twisted vine-trunks. This is some sort of freak natural occurrence -- like the mythical beanstalk, going up into the clouds. There is a THUNDERING ROAR, like an artillery barrage, and the ground SHAKES. Jake looks around at -- One of the FLOATING MOUNTAINS grinding against the flank of a nearby mesa. A huge rockfall is set loose. The mountain is drifting toward them, filling half the sky. The Hunters dismount.

Some of the HANGING VINES are brushing over the upper branches of the beanstalk with a crackling hiss. One by one the hunters grab onto vines as they pass. Jake shrugs and leaps to a passing vine, his feet dangling over nothingness. They climb toward the floating islands above.

dialogue.raw_text: I've gotta finish this thing. There's one more test -- the Dream Hunt. It's the final stage of becoming a man. Then I'm one of them. They'll trust what I say...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Then you need to get it done, Corporal.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jake is gulping black coffee like a tequila shot, looking pretty STRUNG OUT. GRACE is smoking furiously.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jake pushes past her toward the corridor -- GRACE (grabbing him) Will you listen to me? Sometimes the Na'vi themselves die in these vision quests. The venom takes you to the edge of death. (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jake breaks free and wheels away, down the corridor.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Jake, I can't allow this.   You're just not strong enough.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It's the last door -- I'm going through it. You can help me or get out of the way.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (cont'd) And the psychoactive alkaloid in the worm- - we have no idea what that'll do in an avatar brain.

direction.raw_text: Jake stops, pinioned by the truth.   He seems suddenly very lost.

dialogue.raw_text: Calibrating. Thirty seconds.

dialogue.raw_text: No matter what you prove out there-- you are still in here. (shaking him) Right here.

dialogue.raw_text: I have to go all the way -- become one of
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Our life out there takes millions of dollars of machinery to sustain. You visit -- and you leave.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You can never truly be with her.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You know why I'm here? Because Quaritch sent me.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: That's right -- to embed with the Omaticaya. To find out how to screw them out of their home. By deceit or by force, he didn't care. And if it turned out to be force, then how best to do it.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: And what about now, Jake?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'm not that guy any more.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I know.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: But if I tell Quaritch the truth, he yanks me out -- I never see her again. And if I tell her the truth, the clan throws me out -- that's if they don't cut my heart out and show it to me.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: They won't understand what you've done.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: They don't even have a word for "lie" -- they had to learn it from us.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I know. I taught it to them.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Grace. I've gotta go.   They're waiting.

dialogue.raw_text: Link is ready.

dialogue.raw_text: Jake. You can't carry this burden much longer.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (smiling wanly) It's okay. Mo'at says an alien mind probably can't survive the Dream Hunt anyway.

dialogue.raw_text: (to Norm) Prep my link. I'm going in.

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: on Jake. His eyes OPEN. He looks around at the faces -- they seem to TRANSFORM, becoming threatening. Jake looks down at the palms of his hands.

direction.raw_text: -- his hands recede, his whole body, the ground and -- INSTANTLY the circle of Na'vi recedes, as if to a distant horizon, leaving vast ground in between. SPACE is utterly distorted, and SOUND as well -- echoing, THUNDEROUS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: pupils DILATED black. He looks around and -- The onlookers are gone, replaced by a ring of glowing trees, which seem miles high. The whole image is bathed in spectral radiance. Jake looks down -- JAKE'S POV -- his body and hands transforming -- fingers stretching into tendrils, legs becoming roots which spread outward across the ground, a thousand glowing dendrites which connect to the roots of the trees and -- CUT TO REALITY -- Jake is on his hands and knees, PUKING in the dirt. He contorts, crying out in agony as the venom contracts his muscles but -- IN HIS VISION Jake stands serene on a FLOATING MOUNTAIN CLIFF. A GREAT BLACK SHADOW covers him, the unmistakable X silhouette of a diving LEONOPTERYX. The LAST SHADOW.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: down on him as the shadow grows larger -- WE RUSH into his face, into the blackness of his pupil which
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: writhes in the dirt, his back arched as his muscles seize. He foams and thrashes, his eyes rolled back in his head, while inside -- TIME ITSELF HAS ACCELERATED -- clouds scream around the mountain tops, mist boils through the forest. He feels the wind of time blowing through him as -- REAL JAKE claws the ground, moaning, staring blindly while -- INSIDE, IN POV he FLIES over the landscape of Pandora -- --but the forest is BLASTED. Fires flicker among trees that are BURNED black and lifeless in a smoky twilight. A great WINGED SHADOW is cast below, rippling over the devastated ground. AVATAR JAKE looks down at the shadow. Realizes HE is casting it, and we RUSH IN to his PUPIL and -- PULL BACK from the eye of a GREAT LEONOPTERYX, flying lordly and terrible over the land. It lets out an almighty SHRIEK which seems to echo to eternity and -- SLAM CUT to Jake, on his back, GASPING -- back in his body. He weakly rolls up to one elbow and looks around the room.

direction.raw_text: Neytiri's face is flooded with relief.   The faces of the clan elders look at Jake expectantly.

direction.raw_text: watches, her eyes brimming. Proud. Relieved. Amazed. Eytukan places both hands on Jake's chest and holds them there.

dialogue.raw_text: You are now a son of the Omaticaya.   You are part of the People.

direction.raw_text: and NEYTIRI run silhouetted in the night. Behind them waterfalls cascade down in the silvery light. POLYPHEMUS RISES behind the trees.

direction.raw_text: from a rock, slicing into a mirror of water. Jake follows her and -- UNDERWATER, they swim over glowing ANEMONES. They seem to float in a cosmic dance above a luminous garden of waving shapes. Tiny purple fish swirl around them. Their hands come together, fingers twining, as they float weightlessly, as if between worlds.

direction.raw_text: Laughing, they run together into a stand of WILLOWS. Their trunks are as gnarled as bonsai. Long faintly glowing tendrils hang straight down in pastel curtains. Underfoot, a bed of moss glows faintly. It REACTS to their footsteps with expanding rings of light. It is an exquisitely beautiful spot. The willows stir, responding to their presence. She holds up her hands, letting the TENDRILS caress her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jake puts out his hands and the tendrils play over his fingers, his palms, his forearms. His eyes go wide. We hear the WHISPERING of ancient Na'vi VOICES.

direction.raw_text: The Amazon warrior trying so hard to sound casual.   Jake suppresses a smile.

direction.raw_text: He puts his face close to hers. She rubs her cheek against his. He kisses her on the mouth. They explore each other. Then she pulls back, eyes sparkling.

direction.raw_text: She pulls him down until they are kneeling, facing each other on the faintly glowing moss. Neytiri takes the end of her queue and raises it. Jake does the same, with trembling anticipation. The tendrils at the ends move with a life of their own, straining to be joined.

dialogue.raw_text: This is a place for prayers to be heard. And sometimes answered.

dialogue.raw_text: It's like -- a sound you feel.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You are Omaticaya now. You may make your own bow from the wood of Hometree. (she looks away) And you may choose a woman.

dialogue.raw_text: There is Beyral -- she is a good hunter --
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I've already chosen. But this woman must also choose me.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: She already has.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: rocks with the direct contact between his nervous system and hers. The ultimate intimacy. They come together into a kiss and sink down on the bed of moss, and ripples of light spread out around them.

direction.raw_text: sway, without wind, and the night is alive with pulsing energy as we DISSOLVE TO -- LATER. She is collapsed across his chest.     Spent.   He strokes her face tenderly.

dialogue.raw_text: We are.

direction.raw_text: singing. A SHADOW CROSSES HER FACE.   She looks up, and her eyes go wide as -- A TERRIBLE CRY echoes, turning all eyes skyward.   AN ENORMOUS SHADOW covers the crowd as -- TORUK comes out of the sun, beating its huge wings to slow its descent. Its crimson and black wings, backlit by the sun, seem to glow from within. The People CRY OUT in alarm and scatter as the dreaded beast alights in their midst. And that's when they see -- JAKE, riding high on its shoulders, plugged-in to its antenna. It folds its wings and stands calmly amid the paralyzed Na'vi. Toruk lowers its body. They stare in awe as Jake dismounts and strokes the magnificent animal's flank.

dialogue.raw_text: I can never ride again, or bond with my woman -- or hear the voice of Eywa. I can not lead the People. You will lead them, Jakesully.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No. I'm not officer material.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It is decided. Now do the duty of Olo'eyctan. Set my spirit free.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'm not killing you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I am already dead.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It is the way. And it is good. I will be remembered --
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I fought with Toruk Macto, we were brothers -- and he was my last shadow.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: clasps with Jake's in a fierce grip. Jake draws his knife.

direction.raw_text: -- Jake leans forward, blocking the sun.

direction.raw_text: falls across Tsu'tey.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: By his movement, we know that he has ended Tsu'tey's pain. Jake's eyes well with tears as he continues reciting the prayer for the dead, and his Na'vi words carry over as we -- DISSOLVE TO:
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Forgive me, my Brother. Go now to the Mother Spirit.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Na'vi ride direhorses among the abandoned machines of Hell's Gate. Banshees roost on the roofs of the modules, and stingbats flutter about, unimpeded. The SENTRY GUNS are silent, and the GATES are open to the forest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Max, Norm, and a few of the avatars hold AR's as the personnel of Hell's Gate file up the cargo ramp of the remaining shuttle. The evicted humans are sullen and angry, like POW's.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) A few chose to stay. Fewer were chosen.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: and NEYTIRI stand together, watching the departure of the Sky People.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: shuffles up the ramp. His eyes -- the eyes of a lost soul -- meet JAKE'S. He disappears into the ship.

direction.raw_text: DORA. The ISV's antimatter engines BLAZE to life and it accelerates out of orbit. What remains IN FRAME is a virgin, primeval world. Spanning the black continents is a vast reticulated lace-work of
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: a ghostly WEB connecting all of Pandora.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The sun's rays shaft down through the layers of canopy.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) The forest will heal, and so will the hearts of the People. New life keeps the energy flowing, like the breath of the world.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: obviously pregnant, is bow-fishing in the shallows. Children jump and squeal with laughter in the river.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) This is my last videolog.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Jake sits in a chair, talking straight TO CAMERA. He is thin, pale. He looks around the high tech room.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: The science guys will keep the lights on, here. But I won't miss this place.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: glow softly. The entire Omaticaya clan is gathered, seated in a prayer circle around the Mother Tree.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) I better wrap this up. There's a funeral tonight, and I don't want to be late. It was someone very close to me.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: and his AVATAR lie head to head. Human Jake is wearing an exomask. Both figures are still, hands folded, covered in translucent silken shrouds of ROOT-CILIA.
